snippet: "The Last Resort" was a favorite of critics, but never thrived with viewers in the difficult time slot of Thursday at 8 p.m.
abstract: "The Last Resort" was a favorite of critics, but never thrived with viewers in the difficult time slot of Thursday at 8 p.m.

headline.main: ABC Cancels 'Last Resort' and '666 Park Avenue'
headline.print_headline: ABC Ends ‘Last Resort’ And ‘666 Park Avenue’
